analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xad7d6f3caeab82428ba4c5e779419e06c7725a8a.sol:
	Contract WIE has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xad7d6f3caeab82428ba4c5e779419e06c7725a8a.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/42/0xad7d6f3caeab82428ba4c5e779419e06c7725a8a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/42/0xad7d6f3caeab82428ba4c5e779419e06c7725a8a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xad7d6f3caeab82428ba4c5e779419e06c7725a8a.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
